What are the requirements for launching a new currency on Verus?

To launch a new currency on Verus, it must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST, and there must be 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at a specified rate (in this case, 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD) in order to launch.

ncy must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction returned from this command to
initiate a currency launch that will start at 50 blocks from when it was made (default), and that must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD in order to launch.
all of this happens as part of the mining process, since mining the blocks that launch a currency earn the 0.025% conversion fees of participation
in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to GOLD. I could send the following command before the block where GOLD token launches.
After it launches, the only way at present to create new tokens is with a centralized issuance option. To convert VRSCTEST to GOLD, you could issue the command:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
Assuming it launches, and I later want to create mycoin, which can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, I can create mycoin with:
./raw_text_input_wiki/release_notes.md
What happens during the mining process when a new currency is launched on Verus?
During the mining process, the blocks that launch a currency earn a 0.025% conversion fee for participation in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to the new currency.

ncy must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction returned from this command to
initiate a currency launch that will start at 50 blocks from when it was made (default), and that must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD in order to launch.

How can I convert VRSCTEST to a new currency (like GOLD) on Verus?

You can convert VRSCTEST to a new currency by using the `sendcurrency` command with the `convertto` option. For example:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
This will effectively park your conversion until the token launches, and you will either receive the converted amount or have your VRSCTEST returned.

How can I create a new token on Verus that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST?

You can create a new token on Verus that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST by using the `definecurrency` command with the specified options. The exact command will depend on the specific properties and conversion rates you want to set for your new token.
